name: icon4menu
author: Muhammed Fatih

sections.description:
All you need to do is putting flag name with brachets to your menu item’s name. For instance: Some Menu Item Name [tr]

You can use followig flags:

  • Afghanistan [AF]
  • Aland Islands [AX]
  • Albania [AL]
  • Algeria [DZ]
  • American Samoa [AS]
  • Andorra [AD]
  • Angola [AO]
  • Anguilla [AI]

sections.installation:
You can install plugin with the following simple steps.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Which flags can I use?

Supported flags can be found on description.

Can I use fontawesome icons or any other icon set?

Other icon sets will support future versions.
sections.changelog:
0.1

  • Plugin is initialized with remote css, js and flag assets.

0.2

  • Assets are stored locally.
